document_data.mainbody:
Lawrence was a giant, particularly intelligent badger that formed a bond with the druid Lanseril Snowmantle and lived with him in Snowmantle during the 14 century DR.
When Lanseril was imprisoned by the Zhentarim in the year 1369 DR, Lawrence went to live with the half-elfs uncle Willard Gooseford at the villages winery. Lawrence allowed the imprisoned druid to maintain communication with the outside world, by relaying messages between him and his elderly uncle.
He was spotted by the Priestess of Bane Glorganna who, understanding Lanserils affinity with the natural world, ordered the Zhentilar soldiers to kill Lawrence on sight.
